labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: effects the actual set color value, but not the color picker's position.
data.expected_result: The color should stay the same regardless of #
data.short_description: Failing to include the # causes an incorrect color in choosing role colors, even though the color picker position stays correct
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your role color picker - Type in a value like FFAABB - Place a # before the HEX code and remove it - Observe that the color picker position stays the same, but the actual color changes
